Comment: 切换全屏显示和窗口显示

English: CloudHu - Developer & CEO of CloudGames Studio
Bevy logo - All rights reserved by the Bevy Foundation. Permission granted for splash screen use when unmodified.
Chinese: 引擎商标所有权归Bevy基金会所有

English: Rapidly fires bullets towards the target.
Chinese: 自动向目标快速发射子弹
镭射光子炮可以百分百命中目标，但是伤害较低。

English: Shoots a laser that jumps to nearby enemies.
Chinese: 发射激光，命中后跳向目标附近的敌人，对群体目标造成少量伤害。

English: Creates a shockwave around you that deals damage to enemies.
Chinese: 在你周围制造冲击波，对敌人造成伤害。

English: Drops mines that explode when enemies are in close proximity.
Chinese: 投下地雷，当敌人靠近时爆炸。

English: Shoots a heavy damaging laser that pierces through enemies.
Chinese: 发射强烈的破坏性激光穿透敌人。

English: Shoots a seeking missile that explodes on impact.
Chinese: 发射一枚追踪导弹并在撞击时爆炸。

English: Shoots a spray of bullets in a cone towards the target.
Chinese: 向目标射出锥形的子弹喷雾。

English: Increase chance to deal double damage by 12.5%.
Increase chance to triple experience by 10%.
Chinese: 增加10%获得三倍经验的几率。

English: Increase range and speed of experience magnetism.
Chinese: 增加磁力吸收经验的范围和速度。

English: Decrease shield hit and regeneration cooldown.
Chinese: 减少护盾充能回复冷却时间。

English: Increase engine power and max speed.
Chinese: 增加发动机功率和最大转速。
